articles.description: Female mosquitoes are responsible for these deadly bites because they have a special mouth design that male mosquitoes do not have. Researchers said they have discovered the oldest-known fossils of two male mosquitoes with long mouthparts seen now only in fem…
articles.content:
Female mosquitoes are responsible for these deadly bites because they have a special mouth design that male mosquitoes do not have.
